mapper.insert: insert into catalog_property (catalog_id, name, sequence, type) values (#{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select id, catalog_id, name, sequence, type from catalog_property
select id, catalog_id, name, sequence,type from catalog_property where catalog_id = #{catalogId}
